attributes.action: Phone Brian Ashton and request that Lewsey be installed in the rugby team forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned find Mr. Ashton's myopia regarding some of his selection choices an affront to the common-sense of egg-chasers world wide. Fall on your sword, re-instate Lewsey, beg Shaun Edwards for forgiveness, and retire gracefully.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
